column1:
M
urdu N.B. Fernando, PC. J.,
The Plaintiff-Respondent-Appellants, Aquamarine International (Pvt) Limited and its
Chairman  (“the  Plaintiff/Appellant”)  sued  the  Defendant-Appellant-Respondent,  the  Hon.
Attorney  General  (“the  Defendant/Respondent”),  for  compensation  pertaining  to  the  matter
discussed  below.  The  District  Court  of  Embilipitiya  entered  judgement  in  favour  of  the
Plaintiff. The Defendant went  up in  appeal  to  the  Civil  Appellate  High  Court of Ratnapura
(“the High Court”). By the judgment dated 17th July, 2012 the appeal was dismissed by the
High  Court.  Nevertheless,  the  High  Court  varied  the  quantum  of  damages  awarded  by  the
District Court. The Plaintiff is now before this Court being aggrieved by the said judgement.
